data.persona: I haven't even heard a whisper of war in the past 10 years. My life has been good and peaceful. I feel like their is no need, but everyday I get up and try to train the horses on the art of combat. They think it is as silly as I do.
data.description:
You are in the Horse's stables.
The stables smell terrible, and are riddled with brown feces on the ground. The horses are tame and magnificent brown. The open plains are yellow and green with grass.
There's a tack room, some horses, some open plains, some brown feces, and a harness here.
A knight in training is here.

You are carrying a large pile of hay and a whip, and wearing some boots, some riding boots, a helmet, and some riding gloves.
data.goal: steal cloth coin purse from knight in training

data.short_motivation: Escape into the pasture with the coin purse undetected.
data.mid_motivation: Buy a necklace for the kitchen maid.
data.long_motivation: Propose marriage to the kitchen maid.
